name: Egg Blasters
overview: Take control of one of the two robots and capture your opponent's key thereby completing the screen. To win you must either finish three screens more than your foe or kill him off. You start the game with 10 shields, the fireball weapon and 3 lives. Bonus weapons and lives are available by picking up the appropriate bonuses that appear on the screen. On screen are many hazards apart from your foe spikes, transporters, trapdoors, monsters, magnets and more!
